00037 #include "egs_isotropic_source.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_math.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_IsotropicSource::EGS_IsotropicSource(EGS_Input *input,
00042         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseSimpleSource(input,f), shape(0), geom(0),
00043     regions(0), min_theta(0), max_theta(M_PI), min_phi(0), max_phi(2*M_PI),
00044     gc(IncludeAll) {
00045     vector<EGS_Float> pos;
00046     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape");
00047     if (ishape) {
00048         egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: trying to construct the shape\n");
00049         shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00050         delete ishape;
00051     }
00052     if (!shape) {
00053         string sname;
00054         int err = input->getInput("shape name",sname);
00055         if (err)
00056             egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: missing/wrong inline shape "
00057                        "definition and missing wrong 'shape name' input\n");
00058         else {
00059             shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(sname);
00060             if (!shape) egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: a shape named %s"
00061                                        " does not exist\n");
00062         }
00063     }
00064     string geom_name;
00065     int err = input->getInput("geometry",geom_name);
00066     if (!err) {
00067         geom = EGS_BaseGeometry::getGeometry(geom_name);
00068         if (!geom) egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: no geometry named %s\n",
00069                                   geom_name.c_str());
00070         else {
00071             vector<string> reg_options;
00072             reg_options.push_back("IncludeAll");
00073             reg_options.push_back("ExcludeAll");
00074             reg_options.push_back("IncludeSelected");
00075             reg_options.push_back("ExcludeSelected");
00076             gc = (GeometryConfinement) input->getInput("region selection",reg_options,0);
00077             if (gc == IncludeSelected || gc == ExcludeSelected) {
00078                 vector<int> regs;
00079                 err = input->getInput("selected regions",regs);
00080                 if (err || regs.size() < 1) {
00081                     egsWarning("EGS_IsotropicSource: region selection %d used "
00082                                "but no 'selected regions' input found\n",gc);
00083                     gc = gc == IncludeSelected ? IncludeAll : ExcludeAll;
00084                     egsWarning(" using %d\n",gc);
00085                 }
00086                 nrs = regs.size();
00087                 regions = new int [nrs];
00088                 for (int j=0; j<nrs; j++) {
00089                     regions[j] = regs[j];
00090                 }
00091             }
00092         }
00093     }
00094     EGS_Float tmp_theta;
00095     err = input->getInput("min theta", tmp_theta);
00096     if (!err) {
00097         min_theta = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00098     }
00099 
00100     err = input->getInput("max theta", tmp_theta);
00101     if (!err) {
00102         max_theta = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00103     }
00104 
00105     err = input->getInput("min phi", tmp_theta);
00106     if (!err) {
00107         min_phi = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00108     }
00109 
00110     err = input->getInput("max phi", tmp_theta);
00111     if (!err) {
00112         max_phi = tmp_theta/180.0*M_PI;
00113     }
00114 
00115     buf_1 = cos(min_theta);
00116     buf_2 = cos(max_theta);
00117 
00118     setUp();
00119 }
00120 
00121 void EGS_IsotropicSource::setUp() {
00122     otype = "EGS_IsotropicSource";
00123     if (!isValid()) {
00124         description = "Invalid isotropic source";
00125     }
00126     else {
00127         description = "Isotropic source from a shape of type ";
00128         description += shape->getObjectType();
00129         description += " with ";
00130         description += s->getType();
00131         if (q == -1) {
00132             description += ", electrons";
00133         }
00134         else if (q == 0) {
00135             description += ", photons";
00136         }
00137         else if (q == 1) {
00138             description += ", positrons";
00139         }
00140         else {
00141             description += ", unknown particle type";
00142         }
00143 
00144         if (geom) {
00145             geom->ref();
00146         }
00147     }
00148 }

00150 extern "C" {
00151 
00152     EGS_ISOTROPIC_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_BaseSource *createSource(EGS_Input *input,
00153             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00154         return
00155             createSourceTemplate<EGS_IsotropicSource>(input,f,"isotropic source");
00156     }
